document.full_text: images of dominique strauss-kahn, a french politician, being paraded in handcuffs before cameras in new york caused some observers in france to complain about the "violence" of the american justice system.
document.title: the lede: french shocked by i.m.f. chief's 'perp walk'
lines_and_colors: images of dominique strauss-kahn, a french politician, being paraded in handcuffs before cameras in new york caused some observers in france to complain about the "violence" of the american justice system.
